dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 1676 IH: Make SWAPs Efficient Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Donalds (for himself and Mr. Moskowitz) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act to require the Secretary of the Interior to approve the wildlife conservation and restoration program of a State within a certain period of time.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Make SWAPs Efficient Act of 2025 or the Make State Wildlife Action Plans Efficient Act of 2025.

section.header: Timing of approval of wildlife conservation and restoration program
section.text: Section 4(e)(3) of the Pittman-Robertson Wildlife Restoration Act (16 U.S.C. 669c(e)(3)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by inserting , not later than 180 days after the date on which the State submitted the comprehensive plan, after , the Secretary;
by striking If the Secretary and inserting
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: If the Secretary finds under subparagraph (A) that a comprehensive plan submitted by a State complies with paragraph (1) and does not approve the wildlife conservation and restoration program of the State under subparagraph (A) within the 180-day period described in that subparagraph, the wildlife conservation and restoration program of the State shall be deemed to be approved by the Secretary under that subparagraph as of the date on which the 180-day period ends and the Secretary shall set aside amounts as described in that subparagraph.
